column2: White Sword Tech.  Deals damage based on both ATK and MAG.
Physical Sword Tech.  Attack all enemies in a circle.
Physical Sword Tech.  Attacks with a quick, wide slash
Black Sword Tech.  Based on the Witches' Number.
Spear Tech.  Deals damage based on how slow you are compared to your enemy.
Sword Tech.  Deals damage to all enemies in a circle.
Black Dagger Tech.  Weak attack that also poisons the enemy.
Blue Magic Tech.  Reds a single shot of water at range.
Healing Magic Tech.  Heals at least 25 HP.
Red Darcy Magic Tech.  Reds a single shot of fire at range.
Red Magic Tech.  Reds a single shot of fire at range.
Sword Tech.  Deals more damage the less HP you currently have.
Spear Tech.  High physical attack damage skill that rushes the enemy.
Dagger Tech.  Quick shot of Mana Power hits enemy at a range and improves the faster you are.
Veather Tech.  Scans the enemy, but fogs up their judgment in the process.
Physical attack.  An auto-crit against people with certain anatomies.
Yellow Sword Tech.  Deals damage to all enemies based on Attack, Magic, and Speed.
Sword Tech.  Damages all enemies around you.
Shield Tech.  Deals damage based on your defense.
Yellow Spear Tech.  Deals lots of damage.
Red Sword Tech.  The less ATK the enemy has, the more damage this skill does.
Veather Tech.  Attack with your belly.  Somehow deals more damage the more magical ability the target has..
Axe Tech.  Silence target.
Axe Tech.  Confuses target.
Green Axe Tech.  Resisted by MAG as well.
Blue Magic Tech.  Hits all enemies
Yellow Magic Tech.  Hits all enemies.
Green Magic Tech.  Slows enemy.
Red Magic Tech.  Blinds enemy.
Blue Magic Tech.
Yellow Magic Tech.  Hits all enemies.
Green Magic Tech.  Hits all enemies
Red Magic Tech.  Hits all enemies.
Gray Magic Tech.  Puts one enemy to sleep.
Gray Magic Tech.  Poisons one enemy.
Gray Magic Tech.  Confuses one enemy.
Gray Magic Tech.  Silences one enemy.
Gray Magic Tech.  Petrify one enemy.
Veather Tech.  Perform a one-liner on the enemy and hope it's not a dude, but that's okay, because it'd just confuse them anyways.
Veather Tech.  You're Paralyzed!
Veather Tech.  Use your belly to give someone terrible nightmares.
Gray Magic Tech.  Puts all enemies to sleep.
Gray Magic Tech.  Poisons all enemies.
Gray Magic Tech.  Blinds all enemies
Gray Magic Tech.  Silences all enemies.
Gray Magic Tech.  Confuses all enemies.
Gray Magic Tech.  Petrify one enemy.
Healing Tech.  Heals for at least 70 HP.
Healing Tech.  Heals an ally fully (probably).
Healing Tech.  Heals all alies.
Healing Tech.  Removes poison from one ally.
Healing Tech.  Awakens all allies.
Healing Tech.  Removes Blindness from all allies.
Healing Tech.  Removes silence from one ally.
Healing Tech.  Removes confusion from all allies
Healing Tech.  Removes Petrify from one ally.
Healing Tech.  Raises the dead with at least 30 HP.
Erik Tech.  Breaks barriers, and deals tons of damage to one enemy.
Orly Tech.  Rains death on all enemies in a wide radius.
Gladia Tech.  Deals damage to all enemies.
Black Darcy Tech.  Damage all enemies with darkness.
White Darcy Tech.  Warp to nearby enemy and smite.
Veather Tech.  Legendary Ladies' Mann technique inflicts all status effects except death.
NULL
Black Karin Tech.  Rearrange reality a bit to deal damage to all enemies.
Red Magic Tech.  Boosts ATK.
White Magic Tech.  Halves Damage.
White Lavender Summon.  Summons Sun Deity's Servant Teruko to increase the defense of all allies.
Healing Lavender Tech.  Heals one ally and removes negative status effects.
Red Lavender Summon.  Summons Cleopatra, Divine Flame Runner.  Deals Red Damage to all enemies.
Healing Lavender Summon.  Summons Diotima, Illusionary Princess of True Love.  Heals all allies and removes negative status effects.
Blue Lavender Summon.  Summon Judith Perkins, Witches' Descendant.  Deals Blue Damage to all anemies and inflicts Curse.
Lavender Physical Tech.  A magical poke of love and affection, except it's not.
